name: Shaitan Earthblast
prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @feat:shaitan_skin OR @feat:shaitan_style OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)
descriptionText: With a forceful stomp you release a blast of acid from the earth to burn your enemies.
